summary: This is a communication from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding the case United States v. Maxwell (20 CR. 330). It informs counsel that a handful of documents from recent productions were inadvertently labeled with incorrect Bates numbers and provides corrected copies and a cover letter. A copy is also being sent to the client at the MDC.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the communication, informing counsel about corrected discovery materials in the case US v. Maxwell.

events.title: Discovery Correction Notice
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office notifies counsel that some documents from recent productions in the case US v. Maxwell were inadvertently labeled with incorrect Bates numbers and provides corrected copies.

keyFacts: The document is part of the case United States v. Maxwell, 20 CR. 330 (MN).
It concerns the correction of Bates numbers on a handful of documents from recent discovery productions.
Corrected documents and a cover letter were attached to the email.
A copy of the materials was also being sent on a disc to the client at the MDC (Metropolitan Detention Center).
The communication originated from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
